word_mean_info__list.difference: 表地点时，指空间位置上的某一点；表时间时，指在时间上的某一时刻。
表地点时，指某物与另一物表面相接触，或与某地方接壤等；表时间时，指在某一天或某一天的某个时间，尤指在星期几。
表地点时，指在某一立体空间范围内；表时间时，指一段时间或与年、月、季节时间连用。

bilingual.target: 我把它放在你的床上了。

list.abstract: on是一个英文单词，英[ɒn]，美[ɑːn]，同任何一个英文单词一样，可作为某一机构或者装置的简称，但其主要是作为单词来使用，可作为介词、副词、形容词等，且后面加名词。

骆文俊，（游戏ID：ON，曾用ID：OWO），男，2003年5月12日出生，中国《英雄联盟》电竞职业选手，司职辅助，现效力于BLG电子竞技俱乐部。 其出身于苏宁青训队SNS战队。2019年，开启职业生涯；同年跟随战队获得LDL夏季赛季军。2020年6月，调入苏宁一线队SN战队。2021年，随SN战队夺得全国电子竞技大赛冠军；同年，SN战队并入WBG战队，骆文俊成为WBG战队一员。2022年11月29日，2022全明星正赛参赛选手公布，ON担任辅助；12月27日，随BLG3:2击败TT获2022德玛西亚杯总冠军。2023年4月15日，随BLG获得《英雄联盟》2023LPL春季赛总决赛亚军；5月5日，杭州亚运会电子竞技（《英雄联盟》项目）国家集训队名单公布，骆文俊被列为候选人员；5月21日，随BLG战队获2023《英雄联盟》季中冠军赛亚军；7月21日，《英雄联盟》赛事官方公布了2023年LPL夏季赛常规赛第一最佳阵容，骆文俊在列。2024年1月6日，随BLG以3-0战胜JDG获得2023德玛西亚杯冠军；4月20日，随BLG电子竞技俱乐部获得2024LPL春季赛冠军 2024年11月3日，随BLG获2024《英雄联盟》全球总决赛亚军。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. Come on, man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过来吧来吧，小伙子。

yingyinNormal.en: He took off? Go on. Go on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他逃走了？快点。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, we should go. Hang on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快点，该走了。等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Goodbye Geller. Now, hold on. Hold on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再见了，盖勒。等一下…

yingyinNormal.en: Based on this play? Based on this play!
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这场戏？因为这一场戏！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh come on, come on, it can't be that bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别这样，没那么糟吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. What is really going on with you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 说吧，你到底是怎么回事？

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetie, put the pants on. Putting them on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，把裤子穿上。穿了穿了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, come on, Dad. Come on, Dad. Let's go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，走啦，爸，走了，爸走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, here. Come on, come on. Keep up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来，快点，跟上。

yingyinNormal.en: No, come on. Let me show you around. Come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，来吧，我带你到处看看。来把！

yingyinNormal.en: You're sitting on it. Why am I sitting on it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你坐在他上面。我怎么坐在他上面？

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, hang on. There's a Seven-Eleven here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等下，这里有个7-11便利店。

yingyinNormal.en: I meant on the menu. Anything new on the menu.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我指的是菜单 菜单有啥新菜色。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on, come on. Enough with the niceties.
yingyinNormal.zh: 得了，得了，客套个什么劲。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'll get right on that. Oh, come on, Ross.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我愿意那么做。快点。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold on. Sheldon, is there ketchup on that table?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等下，谢尔顿，那边桌子上的是番茄酱吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Riley made us write on our heads!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是怎么回事？莱丽让我们在自己额头上写字！

yingyinNormal.en: Come on guys. Let's go. Come on, it's second down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们，调情的男孩，我们在比赛。来吧，开始了，第二次十码进攻。

yingyinNormal.en: Touched. Used. Sat on. Sleep on. I'll take it all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 摸过、用过、坐过、睡过都不行。我全买了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (与某些名词或形容词连用)表示影响到

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关注；侧重于；专注于
平均起来；基本上；大体上
独自地；独立地；不依靠别人帮助地
在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱
基于；以...为根据；在...基础上
茁壮成长；靠...繁荣；在...中旺盛生长

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: prep. 在…上；位于；关于；涉及；作为成员；以…为目标；向…；以…为介质；在途中；在；忙碌于；靠；服用；由…支付；增加

examination_example.sentence: And you don't have to be someone's boss to tell them they did an exceptional job <highlight>on</highlight> a particular project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你也不必成为某人的老板来告诉他们，他们在某个项目上做得非常出色。

examination_example.sentence: During the decade before the economic crisis, spending <highlight>on</highlight> legal services in America grew twice as fast as inflation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济危机前的十年里，美国在法律服务支出的增长速度是通货膨胀的两倍。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>on</highlight> the general effectiveness of the social cure, Rosenberg is less persuasive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但就社会治疗的总体效果而言，罗森博格的说服力较弱。

examination_example.sentence: The robot was the same size as a regular rat but resembled a simple plastic box <highlight>on</highlight> wheels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个机器人和普通老鼠一样大，但看起来像一个简单的带轮子的塑料盒子。

examination_example.sentence: The Accumulation of Mutual Trust <highlight>on</highlight> Social Media.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交媒体上相互信任的积累。

examination_example.sentence: That is how we have put a giant target sign <highlight>on</highlight> the backs of American workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们就是那样在美国工人背上贴上巨大的目标标签的。

examination_example.sentence: People made car-buying decisions that were both objectively better and more personally satisfying when asked to focus <highlight>on</highlight> their feelings rather than <highlight>on</highlight> details.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们被要求关注自己的感受而不是细节时，他们做出的购车决定在客观上更好，在个人方面也更令人满意。

examination_example.sentence: They put too much burden <highlight>on</highlight> individual motorists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给个人司机增加了太多负担。

examination_example.sentence: Weighing myself every day caused me to shift my focus from being generally healthy and physically active, to focusing solely <highlight>on</highlight> the scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天称体重让我把注意力从总体健康和积极锻炼转移到只关注体重上。

examination_example.sentence: You work with them every day, and you depend <highlight>on</highlight> them just as they depend <highlight>on</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天和他们一起工作，你依赖他们，就像他们依赖你一样。

examination_example.sentence: We ascribe meanings to texts <highlight>on</highlight> the basis of interaction between what we might call textual and contextual material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们赋予文本意义的基础是我们可能称之为文本和语境材料之间的相互作用。

examination_example.sentence: Chat <highlight>on</highlight> the phone with a friend while you walk around your neighborhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你在附近走动时，和朋友打电话聊天。

examination_example.sentence: In the movies and <highlight>on</highlight> television, artificial intelligence is typically depicted as something sinister that will upend our way of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电影和电视中，人工智能通常被描绘成颠覆我们生活方式的邪恶事物。

examination_example.sentence: Many researchers have located hundreds of small rural villages and individual dwellings by using aerial photographs and by making surveys <highlight>on</highlight> foot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多研究人员利用航拍照片和徒步调查，找到了数百个小村庄和个人住宅。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>On</highlight> a recent sunny day, 13,000 chickens roam over Larry Brown's 40 windswept acres in Shiner, Texas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最近一个阳光明媚的日子里，13,000只鸡在拉里·布朗位于德克萨斯州希纳的40英亩微风吹拂的农场上漫步。

examination_example.sentence: Reduce activity to ½ mile every other day, or nine holes of golf once a week with short walks <highlight>on</highlight> other days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将活动量减少至每隔一天步行半英里，或每周打一次九洞高尔夫球，在其他日子短途步行。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>On</highlight> June 7 Google pledged not to "design or deploy AI" that would cause "overall harm," or to develop AI-directed weapons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 6月7日，谷歌承诺不“设计或部署”会造成“整体伤害”的人工智能，也不开发人工智能定向武器。

examination_example.sentence: Fed chair says "US debt is '<highlight>on</highlight> unsustainable path'."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美联储主席称“美国债务‘走上了不可持续的道路’”。

examination_example.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else <highlight>on</highlight> the socially perpetuated "race to the finish line" .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社会上永远流传的“冲向终点的竞赛”中，人们总是担心会落后于其他人。

examination_example.sentence: It is true that CEO pay has gone up — top ones may make 300 times the pay of typical workers <highlight>on</highlight> average.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诚然，首席执行官的薪酬已经上涨——顶级高管的平均薪酬可能是普通员工的300倍。

examination_example.sentence: Research by the World Economic Forum finds that <highlight>on</highlight> average 42 per cent of the "core skills" within job roles will change by 2022.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界经济论坛的研究发现，到2022年，工作角色中平均42%的“核心技能”将发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: Across 18 trials each, the living rats were 52 per cent more likely <highlight>on</highlight> average to set the social robot free than the asocial one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在18次实验中，有生命的老鼠解救社交机器鼠的概率比解救非社交机器鼠的概率平均高了18%。

examination_example.sentence: Draw <highlight>on</highlight> our experience from the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吸取我们过去的经验。

examination_example.sentence: Depending <highlight>on</highlight> your interests and your lifestyle, that might mean spending less time watching television or listening to music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据你的兴趣和生活方式，这可能意味着你要花更少的时间看电视或听音乐。

examination_example.sentence: Evidence either way is weak, relying <highlight>on</highlight> contrived laboratory tests or sometimes unreliable self-reports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 依赖于人为的实验室测试或有时不可靠的自我报告所产生的证据都不充分。

examination_example.sentence: Although it can be a workout <highlight>on</highlight> its own, if your goal is to get back to Zumba classes, walking is also a great first step.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然它本身就是一项锻炼，但如果你的目标是重返尊巴舞课堂，步行也是很好的第一步。

examination_example.sentence: That means prioritizing our activities so that we spend most time <highlight>on</highlight> the things we really want to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着要对我们的活动的进行优先排序，以便我们将大部分时间花在我们真正想做的事情上。

examination_example.sentence: To pressure zoos to spend less <highlight>on</highlight> their animals would lead to inhumane outcomes for the precious creatures in their care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迫使动物园减少在动物身上的花费会对园内的珍贵动物造成不人道的后果。

examination_example.sentence: She is proud that several sculptures have even gone <highlight>on</highlight> display again, albeit sometimes beneath protective cases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她很自豪有几件雕塑甚至再次展出，尽管有时是在保护套之下。

sense_info_list.zh: (与某些名词或形容词连用)表示影响到

examination_example.sentence: What we decide to collect today, what we decide to preserve…will have a strong impact <highlight>on</highlight> how in the future we'll be seen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们今天决定收集什么，我们决定保存什么……将对未来如何看待我们产生重大的影响。

word_usage.usage:
表示“在……上”
on指接触物体表面或构成物体表面的一部分，如a picture on a wall墙上的画。
above通常指水平位置在某物之上，两个物体不接触。
over强调位于某物的正上方，垂直在上。
on和about都可以表示“关于”，about表示通俗性和一般性，所给信息比较一般，风格随意用about，speak about education 谈论教育.；on表示严肃性和学术性，一本书、一篇学术专著等用on，speak on education 发表有关教育的演说。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 在行动中; 在使用中; 在作用中
处于…情况中; 在从事…中
进展; 向前; 继续

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关于；侧重于；专注于
表面上；从外表看；乍一看
大致上；大体上；总的来说
开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题
开始新活动；接受现实；搬家
坚持住；等一等；别挂电话
出售；上市；折价销售；减价出售
反思；认真思考；对...造成影响
按照...行事；遵行；奉行(原则/制度等)
连续地；不断地；直立地；竖着
从现在开始；从现在起；从今往后
穿着(指状态；不用于进行时)
总的来说；权衡各种因素

examination_example.sentence: He said the lucky woman will be announced <highlight>on</highlight> the website and the trip will be shared online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，这位幸运的女士将会在网站上公布，并且这次旅行将会在网上分享。

examination_example.sentence: Before the school year ended, I gave the kids a special gift, T-shirts with the words "Verbs Are Your Friends" <highlight>on</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在学年结束之前，我给了孩子们一份特别的礼物，是上面印有“动词是你的朋友”字样的T恤衫。

examination_example.sentence: These pieces can be folded into a neat little pack and fastened <highlight>on</highlight> your belt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些东西可以折叠成一个整洁的小包，系在你的腰带上。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>on</highlight> Wednesday, isn't it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在星期三，不是吗？

examination_example.sentence: We have you arriving <highlight>on</highlight> the 16th of September and leaving the 24th of September—altogether, eight nights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们安排你9月16日到达，9月24日离开——总共8个晚上。

examination_example.sentence: I had the chance of seeing this first hand <highlight>on</highlight> a weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我有机会在一个周末亲眼目睹这一切。

examination_example.sentence: They're more focused <highlight>on</highlight> vocabulary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们更关注词汇。

examination_example.sentence: The new study focused <highlight>on</highlight> whether dogs can make sense of human faces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项新研究集中在狗是否能理解人类表情上面。

examination_example.sentence: You just focus <highlight>on</highlight> the move.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只需要专注于行动。

examination_example.sentence: Albert Einstein added another wrinkle when he theorized that time varies depending <highlight>on</highlight> where you measure it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦提出了另一个问题，根据他的理论，时间会因测量地点的不同而改变。

examination_example.sentence: This depends <highlight>on</highlight> the type of book you are reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这依赖于你读的书的类型。

examination_example.sentence: Firstly, please do remember to put <highlight>on</highlight> some comfortable shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，请记得穿上舒适的鞋子。

examination_example.sentence: What's <highlight>on</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在上演什么？

examination_example.sentence: Whether we've been stolen from, lied to, misled, or cheated <highlight>on</highlight>, there are different levels of losing trust.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论我们是被偷、被骗、被误导还是被背叛，（我们）都不同程度地丧失了信任。

examination_example.sentence: Before Vinnie could say yes, the President hurried <highlight>on</highlight>, a shade of apology in his voice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 维尼还没来得及答应，总统就急忙走了，声音中带着一丝歉意。

examination_example.sentence: As the night wore <highlight>on</highlight>, people began to close their eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夜渐渐深了，人们开始闭上眼睛。

examination_example.sentence: If the rivers run faster in the future <highlight>on</highlight> average, the clock will get ahead of standard time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果未来的河流平均流速加快，时钟就会比标准时间走得快。

examination_example.sentence: To work <highlight>on</highlight> a project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从事一个项目。

sense_info_list.zh: 在行动中; 在使用中; 在作用中
处于…情况中; 在从事…中
进展; 向前; 继续

exam_freq_info.chinese: 在(交通工具)上; 在...途中
(get on with)关系良好; 和睦相处
(come on)来吧; 快点; 赶快
(be based on)基于; 在...基础上

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 继续；进行；开展；携带；从事；履行
在表面上；表面上；外表上
紧紧握住；抓着不放；等一会儿；有赖于；取决于；倾听；注意听；坚持不懈；不放弃；不挂断
究竟；到底；在世界上；在人世间
独自地；独立地；不依靠别人帮助地
在最高处；在顶端；在最上面；他无法胜任自己的工作；另外；紧挨着；覆盖；盖住
开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题
加油；开始；来到；发生；偶然遇见；来吧；快点；赶快；得啦
浏览；继续(说/做/喜欢等)；发生
起火；着火；在燃烧；处于激动状态
在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱
同意；达成共识；达成一致
稍等片刻；坚持住；等一等；别挂电话；握住
继续做；继续某种行为；处理…
背对着...；对…掉头不管；轻视；否认；抛弃
取得进展；关系友好；融洽；变老；上了年纪；继续做；取得成功

靠…过日子；以…为生；有糊口的钱；以…为粮食；只吃…
引起；导致（疾病、痛苦或某种感觉）
猛攻；袭击；投向；由…承担；急切地抓住

examination_example.sentence: The artists paint <highlight>on</highlight> rice paper or thin silk with brushes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术家们用刷子在宣纸或薄绢上画画。

examination_example.sentence: You shouldn't put your elbows <highlight>on</highlight> the table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不应该把胳膊肘放在桌子上。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>On</highlight> a farm lived a father and a son.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农场里住着一对父子。

sense_info_list.en: used to show a day or date

examination_example.sentence: We are going to help out at a homeless shelter(收容所) <highlight>on</highlight> Thanksgiving Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们准备在感恩节那天去无家可归者的收容所帮忙。

examination_example.sentence: His mother promised to take him to the zoo <highlight>on</highlight> weekdays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他妈妈答应在工作日带他去动物园。

examination_example.sentence: Every year <highlight>on</highlight> 15th October, over 200 million people around the world take part in Global Handwashing Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每年10月15日，全世界有超过2亿人参加全球洗手日活动。

examination_example.sentence: You have made great progress <highlight>on</highlight> your study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在学习上取得了很大的进步。

examination_example.sentence: He also likes to play jokes <highlight>on</highlight> others, especially Martin!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他还喜欢和别人开玩笑，尤其是马丁！

examination_example.sentence: Write at least 60 words <highlight>on</highlight> the topic "My progress".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以“我的进步”为题，写至少60个字。

examination_example.sentence: Was the car driver listening to music or talking <highlight>on</highlight> the mobile phone?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 司机是在听音乐还是在打电话？

examination_example.sentence: But they should save their writing in time <highlight>on</highlight> the computer because it may stop working suddenly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他们应该在电脑上及时保存他们写的东西，因为它可能会突然停止工作。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to give money to support WWWF, you can click <highlight>on</highlight> the icon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想捐款支持WWWF，你可以点击图标。

examination_example.sentence: Later that afternoon, Sam noticed a second-hand book sale going <highlight>on</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天下午晚些时候，山姆注意到正在进行一场旧书拍卖。

examination_example.sentence: As the years went <highlight>on</highlight>, Mike met more people like Ken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，迈克认识了更多像肯这样的人。

examination_example.sentence: Phone booths are finding creative ways to live <highlight>on</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电话亭正在寻找创造性的方式来继续存在下去。

examination_example.sentence: I'm making a plan I must finish it <highlight>on</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正在制定一个我一定要完成的计划。

examination_example.sentence: The station master even kept trains from leaving <highlight>on</highlight> time so Monet could complete a scene even though passengers complained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 站长甚至不让火车准时离开，所以即使乘客抱怨，莫奈也能完成一场表演。

examination_example.sentence: Man of us still have trouble getting out of bed <highlight>on</highlight> time and not missing appointments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中的一些人仍然难以按时起床和不失约。

sense_info_list.zh: 在(交通工具)上; 在...途中

examination_example.sentence: Although rich, Xu avoided comfortable travel, preferring to go almost everywhere <highlight>on</highlight> foot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管很富有，徐霞客还是避免舒适的旅行，宁愿步行去几乎所有的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Don't fight with the driver <highlight>on</highlight> a bus, or you will be punished.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要在公共汽车上和司机争斗，否则你会受到惩罚的。

examination_example.sentence: The rules say that if passengers have bad manners while <highlight>on</highlight> the subway, they will end up with bad credit(信用) scores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 规定说，如果乘客在乘坐地铁时有不良举止，他们最终会有不良的信用记录。

sense_info_list.en: used to describe an activity or a state

examination_example.sentence: Hospitals and blood banks store the blood and try to keep enough <highlight>on</highlight> hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医院和血库储存血液，并尽量保持足够的库存。

examination_example.sentence: Based <highlight>on</highlight> your taste, you can make different kinds of Chinese dumplings using different fillings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据你的口味，你可以用不同的馅料做不同种类的中国饺子。

examination_example.sentence: Karibe divided the volunteers into low-fear and high-fear groups based <highlight>on</highlight> how much they feared a trip to the dentist．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡里贝根据志愿者对去看牙医的恐惧程度将他们分为低恐惧组和高恐惧组。

sense_info_list.zh: (get on with)关系良好; 和睦相处

examination_example.sentence: They teach you how to get <highlight>on</highlight> well with your classmates or friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们教你如何与同学或朋友相处融洽。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers(研究者) have discovered that getting <highlight>on</highlight> with animals can help lower(降低) a person's blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究者们发现与动物相处有助于降低人的血压。

examination_example.sentence: My dear son, you have taught me to depend <highlight>on</highlight> you just as you once depended <highlight>on</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我亲爱的儿子，你教会了我依赖你，就像你曾经依赖我一样。

examination_example.sentence: Whether they're good manners or not depends <highlight>on</highlight> where you are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们是否有礼貌取决于你在哪里。

examination_example.sentence: The new action that/which is taken to protect students' eyesight makes sure they focus <highlight>on</highlight> study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为保护学生视力而采取的新行动确保他们专心学习。

examination_example.sentence: Another type of AI focuses <highlight>on</highlight> understanding human emotions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种人工智能侧重于理解人类的情感。

examination_example.sentence: He decided to work <highlight>on</highlight> a new kind of hybrid rice that had a high output.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他决定开始研制一种产量高的新型杂交水稻。

examination_example.sentence: I have promised Frank to work <highlight>on</highlight> the biology report with him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我已经答应弗兰克和他一起写生物报告。

examination_example.sentence: What belongs to nature cannot be the result of human activities and <highlight>on</highlight> the other hand, cultural development is achieved against nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 属于自然的东西不可能是人类活动的结果，另一方面，文化发展又是与自然对立的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>On</highlight> the other hand, real-world voice recognition is used for more everyday tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，现实世界的语音识别更多地用于日常任务。

examination_example.sentence: They will pass <highlight>on</highlight> the act of kindness to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会将这种善意的行为传递给其他人。

examination_example.sentence: I'm sure you didn't do it <highlight>on</highlight> purpose and it can't be helped.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我确信你不是故意的，那是无法避免的。

examination_example.sentence: AI will have a big influence <highlight>on</highlight> areas like medicine and engineering.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能将对医学和工程学等领域产生重大影响。

sense_info_list.zh: (come on)来吧; 快点; 赶快

examination_example.sentence: "Come <highlight>on</highlight>, let's play chess," Anna said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “来吧，我们下棋吧，”安娜说。

examination_example.sentence: We can get more knowledge from the things <highlight>on</highlight> show.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以从展出的东西中获得更多的知识。

examination_example.sentence: One good tip someone gave me is to take old clothes and just throw them away when you move <highlight>on</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人给我的一个很好的建议是，把旧衣服拿走，等你离开的时候扔掉。

examination_example.sentence: Call <highlight>on</highlight> the "doctor" inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拜访内部的“医生”。

sense_info_list.en: used to show that somebody belongs to a group or an organization

examination_example.sentence: Learn about each person <highlight>on</highlight> your team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解团队中的每个人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>On</highlight> seeing the note, all the people in the restaurant became friendly and tried their best to please Henry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一看到那张支票，餐馆里的所有人就变得友好起来，尽力取悦亨利。

sense_info_list.zh: (be based on)基于; 在...基础上

examination_example.sentence: The embroidered designs were based <highlight>on</highlight> paper-cuts, the most well-know of them was from Bao Jun, a paper cutting master.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些刺绣图案是以剪纸为基础的，其中最广为人知的是剪纸大师包军。

word_usage.usage:
日期前的on常被省略。示例：
The People's Republic of China was established (on) 1 October, 1949.
中华人民共和国于1949年10月1号成立。

介词on，in，at都可以表示时间，但是具体用法不同：
in 年，in 月，in 季节，
on日，on节日，on周几，
at后+年龄或时间点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指在一般的上午、下午和晚上；季节和某年、某月前也用in。
表示在具体某一天及具体某一天的上午、下午和晚上。
表示在某时刻，具体几点钟，也用在at noon, at night中。
指与另一物表面相接触。
指一物在另一物的正上方，多暗示悬空，但也含"覆盖于……之上"之意。其反义词是under。
一般指水平位置高于某物，但不一定在正上方，也不接触另一物，其反义词是below。
